contentfulBlogPost.title: Thank you for an amazing 2023 summit!

body.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The summit was about 3 weeks ago, and the team is still absolutely beaming about how successful it was! After 3 years of being apart, it was truly amazing to gather with our community. Thank you so much to our presenters, speakers, and community for making the event so amazing. We sold over 300 tickets to the event from around the world. Being able to gather again was rejuvenating for our community!","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"unordered-list","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"You can find all the talks recorded on our YouTube channel, ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLN2I5IwhHQ4pa7bp3m6jFO8gbWL4RMv1r"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"here","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":". Please share them!","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Photos of the event can be found ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.flickr.com/photos/open_hardware_summit/page2"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"here","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":", by Ananda Gabo.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"You can follow us on ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://twitter.com/ohsummit"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Twitter","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":" and ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://mastodon.social/@oshwassociation"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Mastodon","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":" and tag us when you share!","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"We want to know your feedback, please don’t hesitate to reach out to myself or any other co-organizer with what we can improve for next year. I can be reached at ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"mailto:hello@leecyb.org"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"hello@leecyb.org","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":" or at ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"mailto:summit@oshwa.org"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"summit@oshwa.org","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":". We’re also looking for ideas on what the summit looks like going forward, so send us your thoughts!","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Thank you again from the OHSummit team!\n– Lee, Sid, Claire, Alicia.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}
